text: Barry Austin (17 September 1968 - 1 January 2021) was a British man from Chelmsley Wood, West Midlands, England. He was the fattest man in the United Kingdom. He weighed around 700 lbs or 320 kg.Why 50-stone Barry seized a chance of life , The Observer, September 18, 2005 In December 2009 Austin played 'Big Brian' in ITV1's comedy-drama The Fattest Man in Britain as Fat Brian. Austin died on 1 January 2021 at the age of 52. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:2021 deaths Category:People from West Midlands (county)
title: Barry Austin
